original_definition: 'average FRCE data' means the set of data consisting of the average value of the recorded instantaneous FRCE of a LFC area or a LFC block within a given measured period time;
generated_definition: 'average FRCE data' means the average of the frce data points collected over a given period of time, typically used for statistical analysis and modeling.

Article 3: ‘average FRCE data’ means the set of data consisting of the average value of the recorded instantaneous FRCE of aLFC areaor aLFC block within a given measured period time;
‘average FRCE data’ means the set of data consisting of the average value of the recorded instantaneous FRCE of a LFC area or a LFC block within a given measured period time;
